mapper.insert: insert into IQ_APPLICATION_QUERY_COLUMN (PK_ID, APP_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, IS_NEED, DEFAULT_VAL, OPERATOR, LABEL, IS_OFFER_OUT,NOTE ) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNeed,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{defaultVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOfferOut,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update IQ_APPLICATION_QUERY_COLUMN set APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LENGTH = #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_NEED = #{isNeed,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEFAULT_VAL = #{defaultVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_OFFER_OUT = #{isOfferOut,jdbcType=CHAR}, NOTE=#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, APP_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, IS_NEED, DEFAULT_VAL, OPERATOR, LABEL, IS_OFFER_OUT,NOTE from IQ_APPLICATION_QUERY_COLUMN where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, APP_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, IS_NEED, DEFAULT_VAL, OPERATOR, LABEL, IS_OFFER_OUT,NOTE from IQ_APPLICATION_QUERY_COLUMN
